text:
August 4, 1939
Mr. Leroy W. Beler
Sound Sales Corp.
59 East Van Buren St*
Chicagoi Illinois
Dear Mr. Beier:
Will you please furnish us with the
list prices of the three Presto recording
machines that we tested—namely, the 6-B, the
12-Y, and the 10-«n Please send this informa¬
tion at the earliest possible moment.
Yours very truly,
AJEsEH
A. James Ebel
Chairman
NAEB Recording Committee
